DOC.brief_summary: The study include 154 infertile woman Patients receive 100 mg oral clomiphene citrate five day start day 3 menstrual cycle , follow daily injection 150 IU hMG two dominant follicle reach diameter 17 mm 5,000 IU hCG inject intramuscularly . Patients randomly allocate two equal group : Group C receive IUI without ESI Group S ESI use No.8 neonatal feeding tube 24 36 hour , IUI perform . Successful pregnancy con-firmed ultrasound patient fail trial underwent another trial IUI maximum three trial .
DOC.brief_title: Endometrial Scratch Injury Women With Unexplained Infertility Undergoing IUI
DOC.detailed_description: The study include 154 infertile woman mean duration infertility 3.9±0.4 year . Patients receive 100 mg oral clomiphene citrate five day start day 3 menstrual cycle , follow daily injection 150 IU hMG two dominant follicle reach diameter 17 mm 5,000 IU hCG inject intramuscularly . Patients randomly allocate two equal group : Group C receive IUI without ESI Group S ESI use No.8 neonatal feeding tube 24 36 hour , IUI perform . Successful pregnancy con-firmed ultrasound patient fail trial underwent another trial IUI maximum three trial .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Couple unexplained infertility assign IUI 1 . Woman 's age 40 year 2 . Ovarian cyst detect ultrasound examination 3 . Uterine lesion submucosal leiomyoma 4 . A previous diagnosis moderate severe pelvic endometriosis 5 . Women body mass index ≥35 kg/m2 6 . Women sign hyperandrogenemia dy
